org.savantbuild.net

Class NetTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.savantbuild.net.NetTools

  • public class NetTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides toolkit methods for helping work with URLs and URIs and other network classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      NetTools()

      Builds a URI from the given parts.

      • NetTools

        public NetTools()

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static java.net.URI build(java.lang.String... parts)
                          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Builds a URI from the given parts. These are concatenated together with slashes, depending on the endings of each.
        Parameters:
        parts - The parts
        Returns:
        The URI.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - If the parts passed in are not valid URI components.

      • downloadToPath

        public static java.nio.file.Path downloadToPath(java.net.URI uri,
                                                java.lang.String username,
                                                java.lang.String password,
                                                MD5 md5)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                MD5Exception
        Downloads the resource given.
        Parameters:
        uri - The resource.
        username - (Optional) The username that might be used to connect to the resource.
        password - (Optional) The password that might be used to connect to the resource.
        md5 - (Optional) The MD5 of the resource (to verify).
        Returns:
        A temp file that stores the resource or null if the given URI doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the resource could not be downloaded.
        MD5Exception - If the file was downloaded but doesn't match the MD5 sum.
